law.catch_line: The Board shall base its recommendations for regulations on information that:...

text.section:
The Board shall base its recommendations for regulations on information that:
the Commissioner develops or otherwise has available; or
an interested person submits to the Board at a public hearing under this section.

section.section: The Board shall hold the public hearings needed to carry out its responsibilities under this subtitle.
At least 15 days before a hearing, the Commissioner shall publish notice of the hearing in the Maryland Register.
